meanings.definition: A system of medical practice that emphasizes the treatment of medical disorders through the manipulation and massage of the bones, joints, and muscles.
meanings.sent1: The osteopathy treatment helped relieve my back pain.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in osteopathy to help others.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his funny bone needed some osteopathy.
meanings.sent4: Her hands worked like skilled artists during the osteopathy session.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of osteopathy lies in its hands-on approach to healing.

meanings.definition: The practice of osteopathic medicine, which focuses on the holistic treatment of patients.
meanings.sent1: My sister chose to study osteopathy to become a holistic doctor.
meanings.sent2: The clinic offers a range of services including osteopathy.
meanings.sent3: The cat received some unexpected osteopathy from the playful dog.
meanings.sent4: In times of stress, a session of osteopathy can work wonders.
meanings.sent5: The essence of osteopathy is treating the whole person, not just symptoms.
